name: Fam Gmap ShortCode
author: Md. Faisal Amir Mostafa

sections.description:
WordPress Google Map shortcode generate plugin

How to use this plugin =

Install and activate the plugin. Now, in the WordPress page editor and write to shortcode [gmap place=’your location’ width=’100%’ height=’auto’ zoom=’10’ /] then publish the pages then display google map location.

Theme compatibility

All theme accepted this plugin
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire fam-gmap-shortcode folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or download the plugin via the Plugins section of the WordPress admin.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
